name: Delve (itch) (ChasmLands)
description:
This is a small game I made for a game jam. Don't expect anything amazing!

In Delve you explore the ruins of a sunken ship searching for treasure. But watch out you're not alone. An unknown sea monster lurks in the wreckage.

-Singleplayer or local co-op for 2 players
-Search for treasure in the wreckage of a sunken ship
-Scavenge for batteries that power up safe zones to hide from the monster in

How to play:
Controls are in the game. Open the blue chests to get keys and batteries. You can use the keys to open gold chests and get money! Use batteries to power "hope" stations to hide from the monster in. When you're done, go back to the starting point and interact with it to win the game! If you are playing co-op both players must be touching the starting point.

You can also find the game here: gamejolt.com/games/delve/235099
